name: Roleplay Servers For Minecraft Pocket Edition
name_original: Roleplay Servers For Minecraft Pocket Edition
description:
**** ON SALE FOR A LIMITED TIME ONLY (50% OFF) ****

Servers featuring Roleplay games are finally available for Minecraft Pocket Edition. Looking for an awesome multiplayer server to play in an awesome roleplay map? This is the perfect app for you!

Play with friends and even other strangers while becoming a roleplaying expert. Browse through the best servers available for Roleplay games on Minecraft PE and start playing today!

Please know that you cannot use this app unless you have a copy of Minecraft PE to use the servers.

Note: This app is NOT an official Minecraft product, not approved or associated by Mojang.
